assertions: Read docs/project-structure-reference.md for project tech stack and architecture
Backend: Use service-specific repositories - see docs/backend-patterns-reference.md
Backend: Use project validation fluent API - see docs/backend-patterns-reference.md
Backend: Side effects go in Entity Event Handlers (UseCaseEvents/) - never in command handlers
Backend: DTOs own mapping - see docs/backend-patterns-reference.md
Backend: Command + Result + Handler in ONE file under UseCaseCommands/{Feature}/
Backend: Cross-service communication via message bus only - never direct database access
Frontend: Extend project component base classes - see docs/frontend-patterns-reference.md
Frontend: Use project state management - see docs/frontend-patterns-reference.md
Frontend: Extend project API service base for HTTP calls - see docs/frontend-patterns-reference.md
Frontend: Always use .pipe(this.untilDestroyed()) for subscriptions - never manual unsubscribe
Frontend: All template elements must have BEM classes (block__element --modifier)
Architecture: Search for existing implementations before creating new code
Architecture: Place logic in LOWEST layer (Entity > Service > Component) to enable reuse
Architecture: Plan before implementing non-trivial tasks
